auth.login_b: Seamless Access, Secure Connection: Your Gateway to a Personalized Experience.
auth.register_b: Join the Todaha community and unlock the power of AI to transform your customer service experience.

common.beyoud: Go beyond automation. Supercharge your business with custom AI assistants that unlock hidden potential
common.int_b: Deploy our AI assistant across multiple platforms such as your website, whatssapp, social media channels, and email, offering unified support and information everywhere your users are.
common.learn_b: Elevate your customer support with our AI assistant, trained to understand your product deeply and provide precise responses to user queries at any time.
common.action_b: Our AI assistants understand your natural language and take action. Clients can ask about order status, schedule appointments, or request invoices – the AI handles it all
common.web_int_b: Integrate our customizable AI assistant chat interface into any website within just 5 minutes, regardless of the platform—be it Shopify, WordPress, Wix, or any other.
common.client_1: Todaha's AI assistant has truly transformed our customer service experience. The integration was quick and straightforward, but what really stands out is the outstanding support it provides. Our clients are happier, and we couldn't be more pleased. Highly recommended!
common.client_2: Our decision to implement Todaha's AI assistant has been a game-changer for us. The AI seamlessly handles customer inquiries, providing accurate and timely responses. It has significantly reduced our workload while enhancing customer satisfaction. We're impressed by its efficiency and the positive impact it has had on our operations!
common.footer_h: Are you ready to unlock the power of AI?
common.footer_b1: Let’s discuss how our team of experts can build a custom machine
common.footer_b2: learning or AI solution tailored to your specific needs
common.contact_h: Contact Us and we will get back to you in 24 hours
common.contact_b: Contact us now, and lets start building your custom Automatic Ai Customer service platform this week.
common.name: Full Name
common.herro_b: Introducing your ultimate business partner: A custom AI assistant that learns, answers, and take action to automates and transform your customer service.
common.conf_show_b: Easily configure and fine-tune your AI assistant using our intuitive platform. Seamlessly test different configurations and updates to ensure optimal performance. Manage settings, integrations, and updates centrally, empowering you to iterate and enhance your AI's capabilities efficiently.
common.metrics_show_b: Gain comprehensive insights into your AI assistant's performance and client interactions. Track usage statistics such as the number of messages sent, total conversations handled, and access detailed logs of every conversation between the AI and clients. Analyze trends and patterns to optimize your AI's effectiveness in real-world scenarios.
common.plat_b: Easily configure and monitor your AI assistant through our unified platform, which provides detailed insights into client interactions, usage statistics, performance metrics, and much more.

package.Packages_b: Discover clear, flexible pricing options to fit any budget, with no hidden fees
